verses.verse: Awake <WH5782>, awake<WH5782>, put on<WH3847> thy strength<WH5797>, O Zion<WH6726>; put on<WH3847> thy beautiful<WH8597> garments<WH899>, O Jerusalem<WH3389>, the holy<WH6944> city<WH5892>: for henceforth there shall no more<WH3254> come<WH935> into thee the uncircumcised<WH6189> and the unclean<WH2931>.

Shake <WH5287> thyself from the dust<WH6083>; arise<WH6965>, sit<WH3427> on thy throne<WH3389>, O Jerusalem: loose<WH6605> thyself from the bonds<WH4147> of thy neck<WH6677>, O captive<WH7628> daughter<WH1323> of Zion<WH6726>.
For thus saith<WH559> Jehovah<WH3068>, Ye were sold<WH4376> for nought<WH2600>; and ye shall be redeemed<WH1350> without money<WH3701>.

For thus saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> Jehovah<WH136>, My people<WH5971> went down<WH3381> at the first<WH7223> into Egypt<WH4714> to sojourn<WH1481> there<WH804>: and the Assyrian hath oppressed<WH6231> them without cause<WH657>.

Now therefore<WH5002>, what do I here, saith Jehovah<WH3068>, seeing that my people<WH5971> is taken away<WH3947> for nought<WH2600>? they that rule<WH4910> over them do howl<WH3213>, saith<WH5002> Jehovah<WH3068>, and my name<WH8034> continually<WH8548> all the day<WH3117> is blasphemed<WH5006>.
Therefore my people<WH5971> shall know<WH3045> my name<WH8034>: therefore they shall know in that day<WH3117> that I am he that doth speak<WH1696>; behold, it is I.

How beautiful<WH4998> upon the mountains<WH2022> are the feet<WH7272> of him that bringeth good tidings<WH1319>, that publisheth<WH8085> peace<WH7965>, that bringeth good tidings<WH1319> of good<WH2896>, that publisheth<WH8085> salvation<WH3444>, that saith<WH559> unto Zion<WH6726>, Thy God<WH430> reigneth<WH4427>!

The voice<WH6963> of thy watchmen<WH6822>! they lift up<WH5375> the voice<WH6963>, together<WH3162> do they sing<WH7442>; for they shall see<WH7200> eye<WH5869> to eye<WH5869>, when Jehovah<WH3068> returneth<WH7725> to Zion<WH6726>.

Break forth into joy<WH6476>, sing<WH7442> together<WH3162>, ye waste places<WH2723> of Jerusalem<WH3389>; for Jehovah<WH3068> hath comforted<WH5162> his people<WH5971>, he hath redeemed<WH1350> Jerusalem<WH3389>.

Jehovah <WH3068> hath made bare<WH2834> his holy<WH6944> arm<WH2220> in the eyes<WH5869> of all the nations<WH1471>; and all the ends<WH657> of the earth<WH776> have seen<WH7200> the salvation<WH3444> of our God<WH430>.

Depart <WH5493> ye<WH5493>, depart ye<WH3318>, go ye out from thence<WH5060>, touch no unclean<WH2931> thing<WH3318>; go ye out of the midst<WH8432> of her<WH1305>; cleanse yourselves<WH5375>, ye that bear the vessels<WH3627> of Jehovah<WH3068>.

For ye shall not go out<WH3318> in haste<WH2649>, neither shall ye go<WH1980> by flight<WH4499>: for Jehovah<WH3068> will go<WH1980> before<WH6440> you<WH430>; and the God of Israel<WH3478> will be your rearward<WH622>.
Behold <WH5650>, my servant shall deal wisely<WH7919>, he shall be exalted<WH7311> and lifted<WH5375> up<WH3966>, and shall be very high<WH1361>.
Like as many<WH7227> were astonished<WH8074> at thee<WH4758> (his visage was so marred<WH4893> more than any man<WH376>, and his form<WH8389> more than the sons<WH1121> of men<WH120>),

so shall he sprinkle<WH5137> many<WH7227> nations<WH1471>; kings<WH4428> shall shut<WH7092> their mouths<WH6310> at him<WH5608>: for that which had not been told them shall they see<WH7200>; and that which they had not heard<WH8085> shall they understand<WH995>.
